channel.title: music on Joy Chen
channel.description: Recent content in music on Joy Chen

item.title: Songs that remind you of a time and place
item.description: In December 2019, I started compiling monthly playlists. The goal was to create a kind of musical diary, a playlist for a specific time in my life. It’s fun to reflect on songs that you listen to, and the memories just all come back to you. This is something I’ve noted to myself in my head for a while, although I wish I’d started creating playlists earlier. June 2012, sitting in my uncle’s car as we drove from Yizhuang to the city center.
